introduce.title: What is Univideo AI
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: Univideo AI is an advanced AI video production platform that leverages cutting-edge multimodal AI technology to transform video creation.

items.title: AI Video Generation
items.description: Create stunning videos from text prompts using advanced AI models. Generate professional content in minutes.

items.title: Multimodal Understanding
items.description: Our AI watches videos, listens to audio, reads text, and performs complex reasoning - just like humans do.

items.title: Audio & Voice Synthesis
items.description: Generate natural voiceovers and soundtracks. Support for multiple languages and voice styles.

items.title: Smart Editing Tools
items.description: AI-powered editing features including auto-captioning, scene detection, and intelligent cutting suggestions.

benefits.title: Why Choose Univideo AI

benefits.description: Experience the future of video creation with our powerful AI-powered platform designed for creators and businesses.

items.title: Lightning Fast Generation
items.description: Generate professional videos in minutes, not hours. Our optimized AI pipeline delivers results up to 10x faster than traditional editing.

items.title: Multimodal AI Technology
items.description: Advanced AI that understands video, audio, and text context simultaneously for superior content generation and analysis.

items.title: Professional Quality Output
items.description: Get broadcast-quality videos with 4K resolution support, professional transitions, and cinema-grade visual effects.

usage.title: How to Create Videos with Univideo AI
usage.description: Transform your ideas into stunning videos in four simple steps:

items.title: Describe Your Vision
items.description: Write a text prompt describing your video idea. Our AI understands natural language and creative directions.

items.title: AI Generates Your Video
items.description: Our multimodal AI creates your video with scenes, animations, and transitions in just minutes.

items.title: Customize & Refine
items.description: Fine-tune your video with our smart editing tools. Adjust timing, add effects, or change styles.

items.title: Export & Share
items.description: Download your video in multiple formats or share directly to social media platforms.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Univideo AI
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us at zyrliuwei@gmail.com

items.question: What exactly is Univideo AI and how does it work?
items.answer: Univideo AI is an advanced AI video production platform that uses multimodal AI technology to generate videos from text. Simply describe your vision, and our AI creates professional videos with scenes, animations, and audio in minutes.

items.question: Do I need video editing experience to use Univideo AI?
items.answer: Not at all! Univideo AI is designed for everyone. Our intuitive interface and AI-powered automation make video creation accessible to beginners, while advanced features satisfy professional creators.

items.question: What types of videos can I create with Univideo AI?
items.answer: You can create a wide variety of videos including marketing content, social media clips, educational videos, product demonstrations, animated stories, and much more. Our AI adapts to any style or purpose.

items.question: How long does it take to generate a video?
items.answer: Most videos are generated within 2-5 minutes, depending on length and complexity. Our optimized AI pipeline ensures fast turnaround without compromising quality.

items.question: What video quality and formats are supported?
items.answer: Univideo AI supports up to 4K resolution export with professional encoding. You can download in MP4, MOV, WebM, and other popular formats, or share directly to social media platforms.

items.question: Can I use the videos commercially?
items.answer: Yes! Videos created with Univideo AI can be used for both personal and commercial purposes. Check our pricing plans for details on usage rights and licensing.
